item.description:
Hi Everyone,

This is a good 7.5 mile race some of us did last year, with the photo on here to prove it - http://www.newcharles...

Fingers crossed that the t-shirt is not pink this year!

Any questions, please let me know!

Take care... Martin

p.s. you're responsible for your own registration etc. etc.
item.how_to_find_us: TBD.. we'll work it out nearer the time

item.name: Organised Race... The Charming New Charles River Race
